tool.name: SNP Plot
tool.description: simple plot of generated snps against a reference sequence
tool.help:
**What it does**
Given a reference sequence
::
>orig QECDQA
and some mutated sequences:
::
>S-24S_m1A S-24S[mutate at 1: A] KECDQA >S-24S_m1A S-24S[mutate at 1: T] EECDQA >S-24S_m1G S-24S[mutate at 1: G] QEC
a simple plot will be generated:
::
E K * QECDQA... 0 10
